notes.2: Matrícula de honor en trabajo de fin de máster (TFM)

notes.1: Matrícula de honor en trabajo de fin de carrera (TAD)

musicLibrary.title: Colección Música
musicLibrary.description: Music library where the user can store the information of the albums they own or want. The user is then able to filter the database based on different criteria to using advanced patterns (examples are included in the filter text input). Table contents can also be sorted out by artist, album or release year. Any individual entry can be deleted manually.

cv.title: Generador CV
cv.description: Generate your CV based on a give template inputting your own information. This project is the first contact with React and it meant to serve as an introduction to its basic concepts, e.g., props, component states and rendering.

calculator.title: Calculadora
calculator.description: Fully working calculator able to sum, subtract, multiply and divide any two decimal numbers. The user is also able to carry the result of an operation onto the next. A failsafe is also in place when attempting to divide by zero. The calculator includes a function to correct the input at any point by deleting characters. It also includes full keyboard support.

battleship.title: Hundir La Flota
battleship.description: A minimalist design for the Battleship game. This project is set out as an introduction to test drive development (TDD). As part of this philosophy, test are arranged before the actual functionalities are implemented in the game code.

onePiece.title: One Piece: Se Busca
onePiece.description: One Piece themed memory card game. The goal is to locate the whereabouts of all the members of the Worst Generation, without repetition. The aim of this project was to React concepts such as functional hooks and lifecycle methods.

etchASketch.title: Telesketch
etchASketch.description: Interactive web-based Etch-A-Sketch where you can draw while holding any mouse button. It includes the possibility to modify the density of the grid, i.e. the number of drawing squares (1–100). Additionally it includes three different paint modes.

weather.title: El Tiempo
weather.description: Webb app to check the weather forecast in any location. want. The user is then able to filter the database based on different criteria to using advanced patterns (examples are included in the filter text input). Table contents can also be sorted out by artist, album or release year. Any individual entry can be deleted manually.

todo.title: Lista de Tareas
todo.description: To-do task manager that allows the user to create, edit and delete tasks, grouping them in projects.

gif.title: Buscador de Gifs
gif.description: Simple webb app to retrieve a GIF given some keywords designed as a practice exercise to learn the basics of asynchronous code and how to work with APIs

ticTacToe.title: Tres En Raya
ticTacToe.description: Game of Tic-Tac-Toe. You can play against another human player or against a robot. The game keeps the score of the rounds played and the whole game can be reset.

rockPaperScissors.title: Piedra, Papel o Tijera
rockPaperScissors.description: First project part of The Odin Project Full JavaScript Course meant to introduce the aspiring programmer to the basic concepts of how to implement interactivity to a webpage using JavaScript
